name: The Masks
description:
After calamity strikes, a lone survivor seeks to honor the ancestors by collecting masks and finding their crystalline gravestones. But darkness covers the land, and monsters are around every corner.  Only by collecting magical masks and skilled swordsmanship can they succeed.

WASD or arrow keys to move.

Use the mouse to point your sword.

Click to dash.

Space to collect masks, which give special abilities

Find each crystal grave to win.
